<:WTS:708489317168971778> ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸: Hand-dyed SP shells

Hello there! I had a lot of fun doing the first batch, and got them mostly all sold. Big thanks to all who purchased one (or two!) and supported me.

That being said, I still have these two shells left (Blink and Flamin' Hot). I have had several people call dibs and then back out, so I'm re-listing them here in hopes that they move. It's a bit tricky to photograph the clear plastic, but be assured that they are vibrant and juicy in person! 

I've decided to drop the price down to $40 each - I would really like these off my desk so that I can start work on another batch! First come first serve.
All shells come with hardware, buttons and membranes!

- ~~Blink (pink/blue fade): $40 + shipping~~ SOLD
- Flamin' Hot (orange/yellow fade) $40 + shipping

Thank you all very much! Looking forward to seeing these with guts in 'em!

******EDIT: Please ignore the bottom right picture, that's a different shell that is already sold! My bad! Darn computers...

<:WTS:708489317168971778> <:WTT:711683426469544006> Trying to get some old projects off the bench, hopefully at reasonable prices!

**SOLD - Atomic Purple GBC with v2 BennVenn freckleshack - $75 shipped US - SOLD**

Shell is authentic, and in decent shape. No stickers on the back. I believe it has the v2 freckleshack kit, see https://gameboy.github.io/wiki/backlightmods#cgb if you don't know what that is. The screen is installed with shims, and is not permanently adhered. The brightness control is installed, hold select to slowly cycle through the brightness levels. It has a replacement speaker installed. The two center screw posts appear to be splitting a bit, so be careful if you take it apart. Plays great!


**DMG-style GBP with FP Q5 screen - $95 shipped US**

Authentic shell, in awesome shape! Battery cover is aftermarket, but a very good match. The lens is OEM, with some minor scratches/scuffs. This has the funnyplaying q5 pocket kit installed, with the palette touch sensor in the top right corner. The screen is not adhered, and is shimmed. There is some dust/smudging between the screen and lens, because I have swapped the screen out a few times and frankly haven't been super careful. As is, it plays great, but you might notice a speck or smudge. Would be a relatively easy fix to clean everything up and stick the screen down if you're into that sort of thing.

More pics - https://imgur.com/a/TimAKJG

Potentially open to trade if you can make an interesting offer, interested in boktai, drill dozer, warioware twisted, other gb(a) games. Most games with unique hardware. OEM link cables

<:WTB:708489317357584415> (Philly, USA) If you just did a re-shell to your Game Boy or DS, I want to buy your **OEM shells, membranes, buttons, screws, and battery covers.** I would like to refurbish some of my own collection. I am looking for: 

-**DMG** full shell (any color *except* gray)
-**DMG** gray battery cover
-**Pocket** full shell, buttons, membranes, + power switch
-**Pocket** battery covers (black, silver)
-**Color** back of the shell + cover in Clear (not atomic purple)
-**Color** battery covers (dandelion, kiwi, teal, atomic, grape)
-**Advance** full shell in Spice/Orange color 
-**SP 101** full shell in any color
-**SP 001** full in Onyx/Black
-**NDS Phat** full shell
-**DS XL** Blue start/select button + screws 

If you have anything that you you'd want to get rid of, send me a message.
